name: Aquatic Adaptation
description: You possess the incredible ability to adapt to underwater environments, granting you enhanced swimming abilities and the ability to hold your breath for extended periods.

name: Absorb Energy
description: You can use the energy of incoming attacks to boost your potential.

name: Absorb Matter
description: You can absorb matter from objects or creatures to fuel your abilities or repair yourself.

name: Adoptive Muscle Memory
description: You can mimic physical movements and techniques by observing them.

name: Animate Object
description: You can bring inanimate objects to life to act on your behalf.

name: Armor
description: Your body or suit grants you enhanced protection from damage.

name: Bestial Transformation
description: You can transform into a powerful beast form.

name: Botanokinesis
description: You can control and manipulate plant life.

name: Broadcast
description: You can transmit your thoughts or audio over vast distances.

name: Catfall
description: You can fall from great heights without taking damage.

name: Celerity
description: Your reflexes and speed are far beyond normal human capability.

name: Chameleon
description: You can change the color and texture of your skin to blend into your surroundings.

name: Communicate with Animals
description: You can understand and speak to animals.

name: Communicate with Plants
description: You can understand and communicate with plants on a rudimentary level.

name: Control Weather
description: You can influence the weather in your surrounding area.

name: Convert Matter
description: You can transform one type of matter into another.

name: Damaging Form
description: Your body deals damage to those around you while transformed.

name: Darkness
description: You can create areas of magical or unnatural darkness.

name: Defection
description: You can compel others to abandon their allies or causes.

name: Density Control
description: You can increase or decrease your own density or that of others.

name: Duplicate
description: You can create clones of yourself that act independently.

name: Elemental Form
description: You can transform into a being of pure elemental force.

name: Emotion Control
description: You can influence the emotional state of others.

name: Empathic Projection
description: You can transmit your emotional state to others to calm, enrage, or frighten them.

name: Energy Blast
description: You can project destructive energy from your hands or eyes.

name: Energy Construct
description: You can form semi-solid objects made of energy such as shields, cages, or platforms.

name: Enhanced Ability Score
description: One of your ability scores is higher than human norms.

name: Enhanced Attack
description: You deal more damage with your natural attacks or powers.

name: Enhanced Defense
description: You are harder to hit thanks to natural armor, agility, or reflexes.

name: Enhanced Senses
description: You possess keen senses beyond normal human capabilities (e.g. night vision, scent).

name: Entangle
description: You can bind enemies in vines, energy bands, or debris.

name: Extradimensional Storage
description: You can store items in a pocket dimension you can access at will.

name: Fear Projection
description: You radiate an aura or illusion that instills terror in others.

name: Flight
description: You can fly through the air, whether by wings, levitation, or propulsion.

name: Force Field
description: You can generate a protective barrier of energy or telekinetic force.

name: Gadgeteering
description: You can build custom devices with limited use functions, mimicking powers or creating gear.

name: Gaseous Form
description: You can become a cloud of mist or vapor, making you hard to harm and allowing you to slip through cracks.

name: Healing
description: You can rapidly heal yourself or others from wounds and conditions.

name: Illusions
description: You can create realistic images, sounds, or smells to mislead the senses.

name: Immunity
description: You are completely immune to a particular condition, type of damage, or environment.

name: Incorporeal
description: You can become intangible, allowing you to pass through objects and ignore physical attacks.

name: Invisibility
description: You can become invisible to the naked eye or specific senses.

name: Jump
description: You can leap great distances, ignoring normal movement limitations.

name: Kinetic Control
description: You can manipulate kinetic energy, slowing objects or redirecting motion.

name: Life Sense
description: You can detect the presence and location of living creatures around you.

name: Light Generation
description: You can emit bright light to illuminate areas or blind opponents.

name: Magnetism
description: You can control magnetic fields to manipulate metal and generate electromagnetic pulses.

name: Manifest Gear
description: You can summon weapons, armor, or tools from thin air or extradimensional storage.

name: Mental Blast
description: You can project a damaging psionic attack directly into an enemy’s mind.

name: Mind Control
description: You can seize control of another creature’s thoughts and actions.

name: Mind Link
description: You can form a mental communication bond between yourself and others.

name: Negate Power
description: You can temporarily nullify the powers of another individual.

name: Paralysis
description: You can immobilize a target using energy, psychic force, or toxins.

name: Phase Shift
description: You can shift out of sync with the physical world to avoid harm or pass through objects.

name: Poison/Venom
description: Your attacks deliver a toxic effect that damages or debilitates targets over time.

name: Portal
description: You can open a doorway through space, connecting two points instantly.

name: Possession
description: You can take control of another creature’s body, suppressing their consciousness.

name: Precognition
description: You catch glimpses of the future, gaining insight into coming events or threats.

name: Probability Control
description: You can alter the odds, increasing or decreasing chances of success or failure.

name: Psychometry
description: You can learn facts about people or events by touching objects.

name: Radar Sense
description: You can sense your surroundings like a bat or dolphin, using echolocation or other sense fields.

name: Regeneration
description: Your body rapidly recovers from damage, healing wounds over time or instantly.

name: Shadow Step
description: You can teleport between areas of darkness or shadow.

name: Shrinking
description: You can drastically reduce your size while retaining your normal strength.

name: Sonar
description: You can emit and interpret sound waves to sense your environment or detect hidden objects.

name: Sound Generation
description: You can unleash powerful blasts of sound or control audio frequencies to harm or manipulate.

name: Stretching
description: You can elongate your limbs or body to reach far distances or squeeze through tight spaces.

name: Super Speed
description: You move with blinding speed, acting faster than normal heroes or enemies.

name: Super Strength
description: Your physical strength far exceeds human limits.

name: Super-Sense (Extradimensional Sensitivity)
description: You can detect things from beyond normal space and time, such as other planes or dimensional breaches.

name: Super-Sense (Smell)
description: You can track or detect things by scent with far greater accuracy than humans.

name: Super-Sense (Hearing)
description: You can detect even the faintest of sounds or recognize subtle auditory clues.

name: Super-Sense (Vision)
description: Your vision includes telescopic, night, or other extended visual capabilities.

name: Swarm Form
description: You can break apart into a swarm of tiny creatures or components, making yourself hard to damage.

name: Telekinesis
description: You can move objects with your mind.

name: Telepathy
description: You can read minds and communicate mentally.

name: Teleport
description: You can instantly transport yourself across short or long distances.

name: Tunneling
description: You can dig through earth or solid material with incredible speed.

name: Wall Crawl
description: You can cling to and move across walls and ceilings like a spider.

name: Water Generation
description: You can create or summon water, useful for attacks or utility.

name: Weapon Creation
description: You can form weapons out of energy, bone, shadow, or other materials.

name: Weather Resistance
description: You are unaffected by extreme environmental or weather conditions.

name: X-Ray Vision
description: You can see through objects and barriers.

name: Zombie Control
description: You can command zombies to act according to your will.
